title: Ticket #4116: Add python binding for proxy renewal
description:
CMS needs to be able to renew the proxies of the jobs in queue. Further, we'd prefer to do this from an external host to avoid giving the schedd permission to renew user proxies (accessing stored user proxies in MyProxy is a fairly high level of privilege).

Luckily, this functionality already exists as a part of HTCondor-C. We just need to expose it to a client tool. Since this is a niche use case (and CMS only uses the python bindings), I propose to only do this with the python bindings and not write a new client tool.
